    SetupHandler class
    Author:
    Eugenio Cortesi this class apport modifies in model after updates

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void assignWindowCard(java.lang.String name, WindowPatternCard windowPatternCard)
      every time that a pattern has been set to the player, it calls the method that check if all player are ready to start the game
      void deletePlayer(ActionEventTimerEnd timerEnd) 
      void setServer(ViewGameInterface server) 
      void setStandbyPlayer(java.lang.String namePlayer)
      after that server notifies of a disconnected player or that a client decided to stop playing, this method is called and it sets the standby status to the client in standby, it sends a message to all clients that this one went in standby and then it counts how many players remain in the game, because when only one player remains it calls the endGame-Controller-method
      void setUpJumpTurn(java.lang.String name)
      this method is used when a action timer ends: a player ended this time and he must jump the turn
      void setupPlayers(java.lang.String name) 
      void setupPrivateCard()
      this method sends the selected private card to the assigned client
      void setupWindowCard()
      this method sends four window pattern cards to all the player, they will then choose one of them

    • Method Detail

      • setupPlayers

        public void setupPlayers(java.lang.String name)
        Parameters:
        name - method gets a name and if the name already exist it means that the player was in standby and now is back in the game, else if the name wasn't in the players list it creates the player

      • assignWindowCard

        public void assignWindowCard(java.lang.String name,
                             WindowPatternCard windowPatternCard)
        every time that a pattern has been set to the player, it calls the method that check if all player are ready to start the game
        Parameters:
        name - of the player that choose one of the four window patter cards extracted for him
        windowPatternCard - chosen, to be set in the player

      • setStandbyPlayer

        public void setStandbyPlayer(java.lang.String namePlayer)
        after that server notifies of a disconnected player or that a client decided to stop playing, this method is called and it sets the standby status to the client in standby, it sends a message to all clients that this one went in standby and then it counts how many players remain in the game, because when only one player remains it calls the endGame-Controller-method
        Parameters:
        namePlayer - name of the client in standby

      • setupPrivateCard

        public void setupPrivateCard()
        this method sends the selected private card to the assigned client

      • setupWindowCard

        public void setupWindowCard()
        this method sends four window pattern cards to all the player, they will then choose one of them

      • deletePlayer

        public void deletePlayer(ActionEventTimerEnd timerEnd)
        Parameters:
        timerEnd - when the updates handler receives this event means that a player disconnected before the start of the game (he did non answer the pattern card), so it must be deleted and deregistered from the list of clients that observe model

      • setUpJumpTurn

        public void setUpJumpTurn(java.lang.String name)
        this method is used when a action timer ends: a player ended this time and he must jump the turn
        Parameters:
        name - of client that jump

      • setServer

        public void setServer(ViewGameInterface server)
